rule.name: street light (streetlight)
rule.message: In American English this noun is spelled as one word.

rule.message: In American English, 'afterward' is the preferred variant. 'Afterwards' is more commonly used in British English and other dialects.

rule.message: This term is chiefly British English. Consider a replacement.
